Module com.jlbabilino.json
Package com.jlbabilino.json

Class JSONNumber

java.lang.Object
com.jlbabilino.json.JSONEntry
com.jlbabilino.json.JSONNumber
public class JSONNumber extends JSONEntry
This class wraps a Number value in a JSONEntry.

  • Nested Class Summary

      Returns the numeric value of this JSON number.

    • isNumber

      Returns true since this entry is a number.
      Overrides:

      Returns:

    • getType

      public JSONEntry.JSONType getType()
      Returns JSONType.NUMBER since this entry is a number.
      Specified by:
      getType in class JSONEntry
      Returns:
      JSONType.NUMBER

    • asObject

      public JSONObject asObject() throws JSONConversionException
      Attempts to convert this JSON number to a JSON object. Converting from JSON number to JSON object is not supported, so this method will always result in a JSONConversionException.
      Specified by:
      asObject in class JSONEntry
      Returns:
      nothing since this conversion is not supported
      Throws:
      JSONConversionException - always since this conversion is not supported

    • asArray

      public JSONArray asArray() throws JSONConversionException
      Attempts to convert this JSON number to a JSON array. Converting from JSON number to JSON array is not supported, so this method will always result in a JSONConversionException.
      Specified by:
      asArray in class JSONEntry
      Returns:
      nothing since this conversion is not supported
      Throws:
      JSONConversionException - always since this conversion is not supported

    • asBoolean

      public JSONBoolean asBoolean() throws JSONConversionException
      Attempts to convert this JSON number to a JSON boolean. The value of getNumber().equals(0) is wrapped in a JSON boolean and returned.
      Specified by:
      asBoolean in class JSONEntry
      Returns:
      the boolean representation of this JSON number
      Throws:
      JSONConversionException - never since this conversion is supported

    • asNumber

      public JSONNumber asNumber() throws JSONConversionException
      Attempts to convert this JSON number to a JSON number. Since this is a JSON number, this JSON number is returned.
      Specified by:
      asNumber in class JSONEntry
      Returns:
      this JSON number
      Throws:
      JSONConversionException - never since this conversion is supported

    • asString

      public JSONString asString() throws JSONConversionException
      Attempts to convert this JSON number to a JSON string. Conversion to string is achieved using getNumber().toString() by passing in getNumber() and wrapping the value in a JSONString.
      Specified by:
      asString in class JSONEntry
      Returns:
      the string representation of this JSON number
      Throws:
      JSONConversionException - never since this conversion is supported

    • toJSONText

      public String toJSONText​(int indentLevel, int jsonFormat)
      Returns the JSON string representation of this number, it is equivalent to: 
       getNumber().toString()
      Specified by:
      toJSONText in class JSONEntry
      Parameters:
      indentLevel - this parameter has no effect on the result or effect of this implementation of this method
      jsonFormat - this parameter has no effect on the result or effect of this implementation of this method
      Returns:
      the number in JSON text form

    • of

      public static JSONNumber of​(Number number) throws NullPointerException
      Creates a JSONNumber given a Number.
      Parameters:
      number - the number
      Returns:
      a JSONNumber wrapping the number
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the number is null

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object obj)
      Checks if this JSON number is equal to another object. A JSON number is equal to an object if it is of type JSONNumber and its number is equivalent to the number of this object. getNumber() must equal ((JSONNumber) obj).getNumber()
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
